description.value:
Constructs are immune to the following effects, unless the effect specifies that it works against constructs.

  • @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.v9RNVTqyTyaPchvd]{Bleed}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.Item.PqV3OCbUTyk2upPD]{Death effects}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.gBhZDjh30JEyh7DY]{Disease}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.Item.PqV3OCbUTyk2upPD]{Mind-affecting effects}, necromancy effects, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.NV4qXRDgb7zTNkW2]{Paralysis}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{Poison}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.3iTdt2NRgIyrychR]{Sleep}, and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.CvsDp0GvojxiF2jz]{Stunning}.

  • Ability damage, ability drain, energy drain, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.33ynSbmexuxC3cAQ]{Exhaustion}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.JGFn4MrDZ6X5vrzU]{Fatigue}, negative levels, and nonlethal damage.

  • Any effect that requires a Fortitude save (unless the effect works on objects or is harmless).

Format:Immunities construct immunities.
